snippet: PRESENT--Daniel H.,M.D. The faculty and staff of the Dr. Henry D. Janowitz Division of Gastroenterology and the Department of Medicine at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai mourn the passing of Daniel Present, M.D. Beloved by his patients and revered by his trainees and colleagues, Dr. Present leaves behind a fifty-year legacy of research and treatment of inflammatory bowel disease. His innovations in the care of Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis immeasurably improved the lives of thousands of patients. Our deepest condolences go to his family: wife Jane, children Douglas, Stephanie and Tracy, and his grandchildren. 1/3

Our deepest condolences go to his family: wife Jane, children Douglas, Stephanie and Tracy, and his grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PRESENT, DANIEL H.
